Package controller

package controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ContentPaneController
    This class is used to control the content pane (Panel) contained in the main JFrame, it controls all the actions and events from the user
    Controller
    This class is the parent class of all the controllers used in this program such as ContentPaneController and FlowChartController
    FlowChartController
